price: (Ẹ rántí Ànábì) ’Ayyūb, nígbà tí ó pe Olúwa rẹ̀ pé: “Dájúdájú ọwọ́ ìnira ti kàn mí. Ìwọ sì ni Aláàánú jùlọ nínú àwọn aláàánú.”
arabic: ۞ وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-ḍuru wa-anta arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
